channel.title: Stuck, small 508 glitch

item.title: Stuck, small 508 glitch
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“cloudscape, post:1, topic:248234”]ok, no matter where i am (wildy, BH, duely) the attack option never shows, this code is from my player.java

[code]{
frames.setPlayerOption(this, “Attack”, 1);
frames.setOverlay(this, 381);
removeWildyLvl = true;
}
}

    else if(removeWildyLvl = true) {
            removeWildyLvl = false;
            frames.setPlayerOption(this, "null", 1);
           }
    }[/code]

i am not sure if that has anything to do with it.

Please help.[/quote]In one of the log-in files, you have to make sure that it creates the attack option. I’ll show you what mine looks like.

	getOwner().getActionSender().setPlayerOption(getOwner(), "Attack", 1);

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck, small 508 glitch
item.dc:creator: @cloudscape cloudscape
item.description:
@cloudscape wrote:

ok, no matter where i am (wildy, BH, duely) the attack option never shows, this code is from my player.java

[code]{
frames.setPlayerOption(this, “Attack”, 1);
frames.setOverlay(this, 381);
removeWildyLvl = true;
}
}

    else if(removeWildyLvl = true) {
            removeWildyLvl = false;
            frames.setPlayerOption(this, "null", 1);
           }
    }[/code]

i am not sure if that has anything to do with it.

Please help.
